name: Join Us
description:
Shhhhhh......They can hear us......who you might ask, I don't know but listen. A corporation came to the "Forgotten" They promised joy and purposed to our forgotten lives, but...who are they...........................

NOTE

Please forgive the poor mechanics, graphics, and music. The game was for a Jam and I did not have much time to work on the game, so my biggest priority for the game was the story and a bit of the gameplay
